column4: ikon:I read ;)  Any pointers to issues with boot loader not .. finding any kernels .. when installing 10.10 onto 3ware RAID card?
ok, so lets step back a little, what mode do you have the 3ware in
so if you have a pointer to a troubleshooting guide I'll gladly RTFM :)
are you using the card as a jbod or in a hardware raid configuration
ok, so where is the problem/error message ?

doing a fresh 10.10 install, everything seems to go smoothly, except when I reboot it hangs at "grub is loading   please wait ...." or similar message.  This is right after the line indicating it ran GRUB 1.5.
ok, do you have any other disks in your system other than the ones connected to the 3ware
yes, I also have an SSD that the installer sees as /dev/sdc, and a DVD-R drive I'm using to install
which device is the actual boot device ?
what about the motherboards bios, what does it say is the boot device
do a test, try to boot of the SSD, do you get the grub error then /
not yet, run the test, lets work this out
its looking for the state files to start the boot
so if in fact it is booting the "old grub," those files are no longer there since I formatted /dev/sda1 (/boot) right?
that's why it's not working then
check out the two links ubottu just sent you
